page.title: 16A Sunday in the life of _ _
page.content: At 07:00 on Sunday morning,12th May 1985 I got up and dressed before going downstairs to join my family.Our visitors,including baby Thomas had breakfast with us of bacon and fried eggs.After,we went,with our dog,for a walk.We returned home at 10:30.We decided to go to Perth to Elco Castle,and had a picnic in the grounds .We returned home by 14:00 and I erected my tent in the garden and played with my friend till tea,which consisted of roast chicken,roast potatoes,boiled potatoes,battered leeks,bread sauce,lemon stuffing, followed by fresh fruit salad and cream.I washed my hair at 19:00 and then went to bed. by Nancy Burn. --------------
